summary: Screenwriter Paul Javal's marriage to his wife Camille disintegrates during movie production as she spends time with the producer. Layered conflicts between art and business ensue.
cast: Brigitte Bardot|Michel Piccoli|Jack Palance|Giorgia Moll|Fritz Lang|Raoul Coutard|Jean-Luc Godard|Linda Veras
title: El desprecio
